DOC.brief_summary: 1. A qualitative descriptive design. 2. A phenomenologic approach to investigate the meaning of the ward round. 3. Interviews of patients, nurses and physicians. 4. A Master thesis.
DOC.brief_title: Qualitative Descriptive Study of the Meaning of the Ward Round
DOC.criteria: Grownups, normal cognitive function, speaks norwegian. Children, vulnerable patientgroups, students.
